title: Managing open data change in government

details.description:
Irena draws on her experiences working in the Government of Macedonia as national coordinator for open data to address the challenges and techniques of managing open data change in government.

Managing open data change in government

About the trainer

Irena Bojadzievska is a member of the Open Data Leadersâ€™ Network. She was a national coordinator for open data 2012-2015 in the Government of Macedonia, as well as national Open Government Partnership (OGP) coordinator.

Irena coordinated the drafting of two national Action Plans for OGP, established 7 working groups under OGP, and chaired a working group on open data. She drafted the law on use of public sector data which was adopted by the Parliament in 2014, and a rulebook on the minimal technical capacities of the state agencies to publish data and technical norms for the data formats, adopted in 2015.

Irena holds a PhD in e-Governance and published her book 'To democratic and transparent government through e-Governance' in 2014.
